instructions:
Mix cream cheese, sugar and vanilla with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended. Add eggs; mix until blended. Mix crumbs, butter and 3 Tbsp. sugar; press into 13x9-inch baking pan.
Pour cheesecake batter over crust.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 30 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool. Refrigerate 3 hours or overnight. Cut into bars. Decorate with frosting and sprinkles to make "presents".
ingredients: 3 (8 ounce) packages PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
1 1/2 cups HONEY MAID Graham Cracker Crumbs
title: Holiday Cheesecake Presents
